fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
At the start of the game, choose 3 people to become part of your Hydra
Do the ability of one of your Hydra members once each

Attributes
If a member of the Hydra dies, everyone of the Hydra dies
If a member of the Hydra gets roleblocked, everyone gets roleblocked
If a member of the Hydra gets healed or protected, everyone gets healed or protected
If a member of the Hydra gets jailed, abducted or simmilar abilities, immeadily kill said person with an immediate, unstoppable, unhealable, unblockable, astral attack.
If the Hydra survives to the final 7, the game immeadily ends with the win of all Hydra members

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have your Hydra survive to the final 7.
